item.title: Kalikiri Travel Guide (Rayalaseema/Andhra Pradesh/Southern India/India/South Asia/Asia)
item.description: Kalikiri is a hidden gem in Andhra Pradesh, Southern India. This guide provides information about places to visit, hiking/biking routes, best things to do, food and drinks, accommodation options, local culture, safety and health, transportation options, and nearby destinations and excursions.
